backtype.storm.topology

Interface IRichSpout

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IComponent, ISpout, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRichSpout, ClojureSpout, DRPCSpout, FeederSpout, FixedTupleSpout, KafkaSpout, MasterBatchCoordinator, PythonShellMetricsSpout, RandomSentenceSpout, RichShellSpout, RichSpoutBatchTriggerer, SpoutTracker, TestEventLogSpout, TestPlannerSpout, TestWordSpout, TransactionalSpoutCoordinator, TwitterSampleSpout, WordCountTopologyNode.RandomSentence

    public interface IRichSpout
extends ISpout, IComponent
    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface backtype.storm.spout.ISpout

        ack, activate, close, deactivate, fail, nextTuple, open

      • Methods inherited from interface backtype.storm.topology.IComponent

        declareOutputFields, getComponentConfiguration
